https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2Lm5OU2PLr4r22icWKLJuZgUe2d.jpg A story of Bangladesh’s liberation war of 1971. Where two doppelgängers encounter each other in the war camp. The film revolves around their friendship & journey after the war. Clouds After Cloud
